You are given an array of $n$ integers.  Calculate the sum of $|a_i - a_j|$ for all pairs of integers $(i, j)$ where $1 \le i \le j \le n$. 

Here, $|x|$ represents the absolute value of $x$.
You are given a list of numbers.  Calculate the sum of the absolute differences between every pair of numbers in the list.
